nodes.text: An aide or assistant was someone who assisted a person of high political position. They were usually close friends with their superior, and were appointed personally by them. An aide also could be assigned to assist a high ranking military officer, such as a general or admiral.
Opdoa, a Rodian bounty hunter with the Goa-Ato guild on the planet Rodia, worked with the Guild Assignments Group under the title "Assistant."
